DOC.brief_summary: This study indented to evaluate the use of Optical laryngoscope in pediatric
DOC.detailed_description: The authors are welling to study how intubation will differ if Airtraq optical laryngoscope used in pediatrics
DOC.criteria: Healthy children undergoing general anesthesia required tracheal intubation. History of difficult intubation. Risk of aspiration. Children with cardiovascular disease. Children with respiratory disease.
